pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Interface to the 'CPTEC/INPE' API // Allows to retrieve data from the 'CPTEC/INPE' weather forecast API. 'CPTEC' stands for 'Centro de Previso de Tempo e Estudos Climticos' and 'INPE' for 'Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais'. 'CPTEC' is the most advanced numerical weather and climate forecasting center in Latin America, with high-precision short and medium-term weather forecasting since the beginning of 1995. See http://www.cptec.inpe.br/ for more information.
